name: Schiaccia Il Gobbo
description:
The Gobbi, fans with the black and white stripes’ T-shirt, infiltrators among the magic Viola’s fans, emerge suddenly in the stands to cheer their team, try tu crush them for making them change faith.
The roar of the viola’s fans are frame to this fantastic and “educational” game.

Only the best un-gobbo will be able to do the record of records. Do not miss the comments of the viola’s fans and the fantastic intro, with which we had a lot of fan and with which we hope to have you fun.

You found new sentences for describe the Gobbi, you have to search “schiaccia il gobbo” on Facebook and twitter! Share them!
